openstack_lb_vip_v1.description: Manages a V1 load balancer vip resource within OpenStack.

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 Networking client.

name.description: The name of the vip. Changing this updates the name of

subnet_id.description: The network on which to allocate the vip's address. A

protocol.description: The protocol - can be either 'TCP, 'HTTP', or

port.description: The port on which to listen for client traffic. Changing

pool_id.description: The ID of the pool with which the vip is associated.

tenant_id.description: The owner of the vip. Required if admin wants to

address.description: The IP address of the vip. Changing this creates a new

description.description: Human-readable description for the vip. Changing

persistence.description: Omit this field to prevent session persistence.

conn_limit.description: The maximum number of connections allowed for the

floating_ip.description: A *Networking* Floating IP that will be associated

admin_state_up.description: The administrative state of the vip.

type.description: The type of persistence mode. Valid values are "SOURCE_IP",

cookie_name.description: The name of the cookie if persistence mode is set
